attributes.action: repeal the Hunting Act 2004 as it is ridiculous, costly to the average tax payer and was made by 'townies' who do really understand the ways and lifes of countryside, nor do they apparently care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It angered me to receive a response from the government with regards to a similar petition to reapeal the Hunting Act of 2004, in which it stated that quote: 'is to end a practice that a clear majority of people across the country oppose'. As far as I am aware there has been serious research done my creditable organisations which found that something in the region of 59% were pro hunting and or would not complain if it was to continue as it has always done and should
